module.name: Ft
module.abstract: 4Suite: an open-source platform for XML and RDF processing.

module-reference.name: Lib
module-reference.abstract: Module providing common utilities for many 4Suite components, as well as for general use.
module-reference.description: Copyright 2005 Fourthought, Inc. (USA). Detailed license and copyright information: http://4suite.org/COPYRIGHT Project home, documentation, distributions: http://4suite.org/

module-reference.name: Xml
module-reference.abstract: Module providing utilities for processing XML files

method.name: __init__
method.abstract: errorCode = Numeric ID for the type of error. messages = Mapping of errorCodes to localized error message strings. argtuple or keyword args = Values for message string formatting.

function.name: GetConfigVar
function.abstract: Return the value of a single variable using the dictionary returned by 'get_config_vars()'. Equivalent to GetConfigVars().get(name)

function.name: GetConfigVars
function.abstract: With no arguments, return a dictionary of all configuration variables relevant for the current installation. With arguments, return a list of values that result from looking up each argument in the configuration variable dictionary.
function.description:
The following are the currently defined variables and their meaning:
NAME, FULLNAME, VERSION, URL - fields as given for call to setup() BINDIR - directory for user executables DATADIR - directory for read-only platform-independent data LIBDIR - directory for extra libraries LOCALEDIR - directory for message catalogs LOCALSTATEDIR - directory for modifiable host-specific data SYSCONFIDIR - directory for read-only host-specific data

function.name: __ft__showwarning
function.abstract: warnings.showwarning() replacement that word-wraps the message if file is a terminal, and doesn't add filename, line, stack info to FtWarnings.
